post_content:
Looking for some specific backs to complete various team sets. If you have any of the following I would be very interested:

Red Dooin or Mickey Doolin in EPDG
Mickey Doolan (fielding) in Cycle or American Beauty
Kitty Bransfield in Hindu
Wid Conroy in Tolstoi
Bob Ganley in Hindu
Bob Unglaub in American Beauty
Harry Gasper, Dick Hoblitzell, and Billy Campbell in Carolina Brights or Broad Leaf

Let me know if you have anything you'd be willing to sell. Thank you.

Chris
